content: Investments Insurance Asked by AnonymousAsked on 04 May 2019Anybody heard of V-more? what are your thoughts?I recently have a friend trying to sell me the idea of joining this team who apparently offers you cashback for online purchases but tbh the whole thing feels like an MLM. Luke Ho, Money Maverick at Money MaverickLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 09 May 2019It is a scam. There is fundamentally nothing there financially. Their products DO work, like how Herbalife products work but all the costs are passed on to the consumer in a fairly painful manner.0 comments0
